title: Unable to connect to authentication
body: Everything was working fine for the last couple months ever since I bought a nice fiber optic package, but today LoL just wont let me authenticate, and if I log on and it finally works it disconnects immediately. Ive uninstalled and reinstalled, reset internet and restarted computer, I use no antivirus and I'm on windows 10. This issue seems to be frequent today, and there seems to be no solution so far, but I'd like to add that more people are experiencing it right now, and I'd like for you to understand this is a pressing issue that I'd like to be resolved quickly. Mans gotta do his G4 promos you know?

replies.body: After working with another player I believe we've resolved this issue, please try again.
Found the problem, please upload the fix to EUW servers, im not on NA :]
Its still not working, mind telling me what im doing wrong?
